dcterms:creator: M. Everingham
L. Van Gool
C.K. Williams
J. Winn

dcterms:description: The PASCAL VOC 2012 dataset contains 1464 well-annotated images in the training set and 1449 images in the validation set. It is used for evaluating semantic segmentation tasks.
dcterms:title: PASCAL VOC 2012

dcterms:creator: M. Cordts

M. Enzweiler
R. Benenson
U. Franke
S. Roth
B. Schiele
dcterms:description: The Cityscapes dataset contains 2975 images in the training set and 500 images in the validation set, specifically designed for semantic urban scene understanding.
dcterms:title: Cityscapes

dcterms:creator: B. Hariharan

dcterms:description: The Semantic Boundaries Dataset (SBD) provides additional training images for semantic segmentation tasks, containing 9118 images that are coarsely annotated.
dcterms:title: SBD (Semantic Boundaries Dataset)
